name: Verald Defense
description:
Verald Defense is a space tower defense game where you create, develop and command your spaceships. You must defend your paths against waves of enemies rushing towards you. Place spaceships and use numerous upgrades to defend all of the incoming waves of enemies. In this game you will need all of your logic and attentiveness.

The planet Verald is your main base.
Click on your base to create spaceships or develop exist spaceships. The spaceship will be created at the first available free position nearest to the planet Verald (maximum free 2 positions).

  • Very dynamic gameplay
  • 3 different game modes
  • More than 15 different levels
  • 1 bonus level
  • 8 different types of spaceships and upgrades
  • 6 different types of additional improvements
  • 5 different types of enemies with special attributes
  • Various types of item collections
  • Ultimate spaceship control – build, upgrade and repair

Game contains 3 game modes and 5 different levels

  • Enemies death

To finish level you must destroy certain amount of enemies with your spaceships. You're not able to know what path enemies will choose for attacking your planet, so check by what path they comes and build several spaceships to kill them fast.

  • Survival

The objective of this level is to survive until the timer expires. If an enemy reaches your planet, it will be destroyed. You're not able to know what path enemies will choose for attacking your planet, so check by what path they comes and build several spaceships to kill them fast.

  • Collection

Enemies appear in different time and places. The objective of this level is to collect all heart coins that appear in random places and defend your planet from enemy attack. When enemies appear randomly, they will move to the planet Verald. Each enemy deals 1 damage on collision with the planet Verald.

Enemies appear in different time and places. The objective of this level is to collect 10 heart coins, 10 spikyball coins and defend your planet from enemy attack. The coins appear in random places. Spikyballs moves from any random side of the map to the other opposite side.When enemies appear randomly, they will move to the planet Verald. Each enemy deals 1 damage on collision with the planet Verald.

NOTE: You must complete all three game modes to unlock the Bonus level

You have 8 types of spaceships

Spaceships can be moved between fields. You just need to select the spaceship to move and select the desired destination field.

* Your spaceships can't attack during the movement.
* Your spaceships automatically shoot at the nearest enemy spaceships.
* When your spaceship collides with an enemy spaceship, your spaceship will be destroyed.
* When your spaceship collides with an asteroid, your spaceship will be destroyed.
* The spaceship is destroyed if an asteroid collides with the spaceship.

You have 8 types of spaceship upgrades and 6 types of additional improvements
